goal: Implement the maid_get_schema MCP tool to wrap MAID Runner's schema command and expose it via the Model Context Protocol
description: Create the schema.py module that implements the maid_get_schema tool. This tool wraps the MAID Runner CLI schema command, handles async execution, captures stdout/stderr, parses the JSON schema output, and returns structured JSON responses compatible with MCP clients.
